rows.label: qst500701_msg0001
rows.name: We had an Ardun calf born recently.

rows.label: qst500701_msg0002
rows.name: Take a look - isn't he adorable?

rows.label: qst500701_msg0003
rows.name:
The only thing is, usually when these
beauties give birth, it's to a bunch of
calves at once...

rows.label: qst500701_msg0004
rows.name:
But for some reason this one was
an only child.

rows.label: qst500701_msg0005
rows.name:
So I feel like I've gotta take
extra good care of him.

rows.label: qst500701_msg0006
rows.name: Hey, you're Drivers, right?

rows.label: qst500701_msg0007
rows.name:
If you've got time to spare, would you
help me look after the calf?

rows.label: qst500701_msg0008
rows.name:
You don't have to do much, just give
him a feed every once in a while.

rows.label: qst500701_msg0009
rows.name:
I don't really have any reward to offer,
but looking after an animal might make
a nice change from battling for you!

rows.label: qst500701_msg0010
rows.name:
And interacting with all kinds of
different people should help him
grow up big and strong.

rows.label: qst500701_msg0011
rows.name: Well, come round any time!

rows.label: qst500701_msg0101
rows.name:
Oh, have you brought some food
for the Ardun?

rows.label: qst500701_msg0102
rows.name:
He's still only a youngster, so there
are limits to what he can eat.

rows.label: qst500701_msg0103
rows.name:
Anyway, if you have something he'll
enjoy, go ahead and feed him!

rows.label: qst500701_msg0201
rows.name:
Oh, have you brought some food
for the Ardun?

rows.label: qst500701_msg0202
rows.name:
He's really been growing lately,
hasn't he? But he's not done yet!

rows.label: qst500701_msg0301
rows.name:
Oh, have you brought some food
for the Ardun?

rows.label: qst500701_msg0302
rows.name:
Thanks to all your help, he's growing
up splendidly! I bet he's grateful too.

rows.label: qst500701_msg0401
rows.name:
Oh, have you brought some food
for the Ardun?

rows.label: qst500701_msg0402
rows.name:
Thanks to all your help, he's all
grown up! In fact, he's grown up so
strong, I'm having trouble handling him.

rows.label: qst500701_msg0403
rows.name:
He has a huge appetite, too.
If you have anything to give him,
be my guest!

rows.label: qst500701_msg0501
rows.name:
Oh, have you brought some food
for the Ardun?

rows.label: qst500701_msg0502
rows.name:
Thanks to all your help, he might
just become the strongest Ardun
in all of Gula.

rows.label: qst500701_msg0503
rows.name:
Maybe I should give him a name
of his very own...

rows.label: qst500701_msg0601
rows.name:
I've been watching Ardun grow
since the day I was born...

rows.label: qst500701_msg0602
rows.name:
But never in all my years have I seen
one grow up this strong. He doesn't
even need anyone to feed him now!

rows.label: qst500701_msg0603
rows.name:
But listen, I came up with a
special name for him.

rows.label: qst500701_msg0604
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Relentless Arduran!

rows.label: qst500701_msg0605
rows.name: [ML:Feeling ]What d'you think? Cool, right?

rows.label: qst500701_msg0606
rows.name:
Feel free to spend some time with
Relentless Arduran if you like!

rows.label: qst500701_msg0607
rows.name:
Just try not to get too
carried away, OK?
